role_dependencies: Installs Java on nearly any OS
Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description_full: Snap is a software packaging and deployment system developed by Canonical for the operating systems that use the Linux kernel.
role_description_repo: This repository contains an Ansible role that ensures Snap is installed and properly configured on Linux.
role_description_quick: An Ansible role that ensures Snap is installed and properly configured on Linux
